unnormalised: FYI, Companies Act, 2013 specifies the regulations for Pvt. Ltd. companies, including compliances like filing of AOC-4 and MGT-7 forms with the MCA before the due date. Remember to consult a CS for detailed advice on corporate governance.
normalised: F-Y-I, Companies Act, two thousand and thirteen specifies the regulations for P-v-t. L-t-d. companies, including compliances like filing of A-O-C-four and M-G-T-seven forms with the M-C-A before the due date. Remember to consult a C-S for detailed advice on corporate governance.
